original: intros n x H. induction x as [|hd tl IH]. - simpl. apply H. - destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct (inf_egal n hd) eqn:E. + simpl. split. * apply H1. * apply IH in H2. apply sorted_ins_Cons; auto. + simpl. split. * apply H1. * apply sorted_ins_Cons. { apply E. } { apply sorted_cdr in H2. auto. }
